name: American Eagle EMB 145, Central Illinois Regional - Chicago O'Hare
description:
In this video I take a very short feeder flight between Bloomington-Normal (Central Illinois Regional) and Chicago O'Hare airports.

We travel on an American Eagle Embraer 145LR in seat 17A. The video features a spectacular takeoff and immediate left turn - quite an experience in the little Embraer! There are also some views of Chicago Downtown as well as some scenic highlights over Northern Illinois.

I hope you enjoy the video - and please do leave a comment if you liked it!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter, @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips
